instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: \\"My needs are simple, the BEST\\".    My interest in this device was to evaluate its capability for use within a private high school that serves the bottom socio-economic quartile.   Our goal is to increase the quantity and quality of reading done by students in an environment where we cannot afford up to date textbooks and fiction.    The product met or exceeded every technology requirement without exception.   This product received our highest value, ease of use, design, networking, and durability ratings.   Instead of buying books and placing them on shelves, we are purchasing this portable hand held digital library for students to check-out and use.  (We lack the funding to simply give each student their own unit).    Objections to the device: Old style 20th century vintage English Language Arts (ELA) teachers could not overcome the lack of physically turning pages when reading.  Apparently old style paradigms die hard for the veteran teachers.  Students embraced this digital library with energy and full enthusiasm.  (When inflexible Teachers fail to recognize the abilities of students, you can stop wondering why we have education problems in this country).    This product is superior in every way save one: Color.  For graphics, maps, illustrations, etc. the device needs color display capabilities.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: I bought this because i'm always on the run between work and college, I barely have time to have a charger plugged in the wall. I needed a quick charger between my commutes. 800-1000 mA weren't quick enough with this one i get 10% in 3-5 min while using Bluetooth for music and actually using the phone. I also use GPS and record video so my phone doesn't drain battery faster than it is charging any more. My only problem form giving it 5 stars. It doesn't hold on to the walls of the 12v socket really well i need to keep pushing it every once and while. did i forget to mention  that it is almost hidden and take small space. It doesn't look ugly and big flashy cheap leds. Good overall.
output: It did the trick for my epic 4g touch

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input:
Pros: The keyboard came fully charged and links to my tablet well. Keyboard turns itself off after not being used. Case fits tablet snuggly.

Cons: Does not have a way to prop tablet up-there should be a notch in the keyboard or something. The case is too flimsy to stand on its own as in the picture so I have to prop it up against the top row of keys. The case materials seems flimsy, I expect that the magnetic flap will get bent at some point in the future. Also if I don't close it just right the keyboard punches the button on my tablet so that my tablet screams "I CAN'T FIND A NETWORK CONNECTION." Pretty embarrassing, especially when it happened during a meeting.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: I really like the Kindle fire hd... but i have to give it 3 stars. I see why people went for the nook instead. This fire is suppose to be 8gb... but thats not what shows on my kindle fire... after about 4.2 gb of games on there it maxed out and i have to delete a mess of things to have room to do anything. I called and talked to amazon.com and the guy told me well the system itself takes up a lot of gig room o.0 which i was like okay. He told me i can put the items in the cloud storage but i will lose my previous levels and investments into those games. He told me that on some games i can register it through Facebook and try to save it that way... then i was told well i should have just gone for the model up with the unlimited cloud... well i was nice and didn't retort like i normally do since it wasn't offered for me when i bought my fires. Do i feel rooked... of course i do. Do i feel like i got a good deal nah... and what i think about amazon customer service and resolving my 8gb prob which i don't see it show i even have 8gb that i apparently wont see according to customer service, well i think i will just post my review. Sorry. I am an amazon fan. ... and now my foolish self has to try and purchase a bigger fire will check the new one when i receive it that it will cover what i need and it says and shows what its suppose to. Don't shame me twice amazon.com.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: Only regret: The keyboard layout is bad. There is no way to turn the mouse pad off if you are using an external mouse so you will end up hitting the mouse with your palm often. The keyboard layout has the laptop-function key on the left where all standard keyboards have the control key. This means if you are a coder, etc, and are used to hitting left control-V, etc, you will find yourself messed up hitting the function key instead. The F1-F12 keys are not highlighted in white, they are in dark red making you have to physically look at the keys to see them. So for anyone who is very particular about your keyboard layout - look carefully at this first. Other than that, great laptop, easy to get rid of the pre-loaded software or simply wipe it and re-install.
output: Laptop works exactly as specified. It's a great laptop. Beware of the keyboard.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: My battery only lasted 6 months and then no longer held it's charge.  I'm lucky if I get 20 minutes now after a full charge.    I ordered this battery from a different supplier (New Energy Warehouse).   It was sent from China and not the USA (as stated).  The battery had no serial number or barcode.   There wasn't even a full invoice or guarantee card.    I recommend to send back any battery which comes without a serial number and full invoice.  Simply claim through Amazon within 90 days of ordering if you can get no answer from the seller.
output: Make sure you get a battery with a serial number and full invoice

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: This bag is wonderful.  It fits my Dell Insprion like a glove, but let me tell you why I call it a bag for my bag. I often have to make a meeting where a coffee shop helps me kill time between stops. I have a large over the shoulder laptop bag which holds the kitchen sink and perhaps even the dish rack too. There is a pocket for the laptop, but I throw so much stuff in all the various pockets when I am in a hurry, I risk placing something that will shift position and end up in the laptop pocket.  The Dell has a beautiful glass-like outer shell and I don't want it scratched by my iPod, cordless mouse, pens, and all the other junk I toss in the bag.    This bag in a bag allows me to easily slip the laptop into it and then place the entire bag in the pocket in my big bag. It never shifts and it is incredibly protective. The bag is a 'perfect' fit for a 15.4\\" laptop.  The only extras that will fit in the bag is a few USB memory sticks, or a mouse pad, but NOT the power cord or anything else too thick or too large.  If you're looking for a perfect bag, this is it.    Oh, often, when I go to a meeting, the only thing I need is the laptop.  It is so convenient to simply pull this bag out of my big bag and then see my client. When I enter with my laptop in this sleeve, it is impressive, thin, and ultra convenient.    That's my two-cent worth.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input:
The card is good but the cover is plastic and for the price could have been metal.

Some of the monitoring softwarez wont show the 6GB so you need to check it in GPU Z or Windows performace tools. Its there but some programs dont recognize it. So dont worry about that.

Takes 2 slots worth of space in your Rig.

Maxes most games , so far no noise or heating issues.

Tested BF 3 at 70FPS easy and CS GO at constant 250+FPS.

Box has all the accesories you need.

Plenty of unboxing vids at you tube( similar to the 3GB model except the internal memory)

Overclock hard button on the card but you dont really need it for any of the current games.
output: Powerful , need expertise to set up manually

input: product as advertised and worked as promised. additional info is not required but web site says I need to type this.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: First off, this tablet arrived in less than a week even though the estimated delivery time was much longer. This is actually our 2nd Ugee product. We had previously bought a Ugee M708, and were pleasantly surprised at how good it was for the price, having owned a similar, and much more expensive Wacom tablet. We decided to give this a go since the comparable Cintiq is 4x the cost. It is a great tablet. No noticeable lag, nice adjustable stand, comfortable pen, huge screen. We had a slight problem with it syncing up to Adobe Flash, but Ugee customer service helped fix it right away, and everything works perfectly. We could not have been happier with the care we received from them. The customer service is outstanding, some of the best I have ever encountered. I would definitely recommend this product to others. I will update this if we run in to any other issues.

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: In my never-ending quest to get a good keyboard portfolio for my iPad, I ordered this the other day.  Received the case last night, returned it this morning.  It's a good looking case, and it does hold the iPad very securely, but it had some key flaws that made it unworkable for me:    *Keyboard case does not hold the Apple keyboard securely, so it slips out each time you open the case.  A simply restraining strap would have solved that problem.    *It's difficult to put it into landscape mode, and once it's in there, the bottom tends to round so it rocks back and forth slightly -- irritating when you're trying to watch a movie!      *I did like the pouch at the top; finally, someplace to put the stylus!  Unfortunately, that wasn't enough to make up for the disappoitnments.    *Finally, in order to fit the keyboard, the case is about 1 - 1 1/2 inches longer than the iPad, which made it not fit in my netbook case... I should have seen that one coming, though.    Overall, I had really high hopes for this one, but it didn't live up to it.  My search continues!  (by the way, I'm aware that there are plenty of good keyboard portfolios out there... but not having a shift key on both sides of the keyboard is a deal killer for me... so... my own pickiness is killing me.  :))

instruction: Given an Amazon customer review, write a title for the review. The preferred titles are under fifteen words.
input: Really good screen protector
